meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Choyke Kevin Friloux Ben Bass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4069.

td.p: Amy Choyke, an attorney from Pearland, Texas
Kevin Friloux, a stockbroker from Houston, Texas
Ben Bass, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $54,801)

tr.td: DESERT PLANTS
TV ROOMMATES
PEOPLE EAT THAT?
BAD NEWS
WINNERS
CLICHES IN OTHER WORDS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_3', 'clue_J_6_3_stuck', '(Ben: What is off the beaten path?)
(Kevin: What is [*]?)
(Alex: No.)
...
(Alex: What is
[**]?)
(Alex: Ben, you did it again -- you put the same word in your response
that we had in the clue,
and it has to be in other words.)
[Kevin\'s response was ruled incorrect and later the decision was reversed.]

[*]off the beaten trail [**]off the beaten track

BenKevin
')

Ben
Kevin
Amy

New champion: $10,199
2nd place: trip to Zermatt, Switzerland & stay at the Schweizerhof by Colette Vacations

Kevin
Amy

(including 2 DDs),

(including 1 DD),

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
